review_data.title: Fantastic food, relaxed atmossphere, great people
review_data.content: Fantastic food, relaxed atmossphere, great people. Nic is cooking with passion and love. He provides every day a different lunch dish. Always one can choose between meat and vegi option. Mostly even there is a possiblity for vegan version.

review_data.title: Defintiv mal was anderes
review_data.content: Kleines, aber nettes Restaurant, man fühlt sich ein wenig nach San Francisco versetzt. Gibt nicht viel Auswahl, aber das Tagesmenu...More

review_data.title: Tiny but nice place for lunch
review_data.content: This is a tiny cafe that only serves lunch during weekdays. It is definitely different from others and decorated with colourful graffiti-like paintings/photos. When I visited they served tacos with chicken or vegetarian with beans. It came with a salad, some fruit, salsa, a softdrink...More

review_data.title: Tasty chicken burrito and friendly owner, Nick
review_data.content: zoO is a tiny operation run by owner Nick and is open weekday’s 11a-2p. There is only one main table and the rest is standing room only inside, while outside there is a long table with chairs and a bench for seating. A constantly changing...More
